Cinema feedback Cinema contact Bus From Rotterdam Central Station you can take bus 1, 11, 131 and 142 to reach Filet. You can then get out at bus stop Americainweg. Train From your current position, take the train to Rotterdam Central Station. You can then take the bus to Filet. Subway Take line D or E to De Kuip. Get out at stop Americainweg. Language Feedback Send Name: Feedback: Score: Review: Write a review Contact We are located at Cor Kieboomplein 501 in Rotterdam, zip code 3077 MK. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. You can email us at helpdesk@filet.nl or you can call us at +31 101234567.
